recipesJson.name: Iced Green Tea Latte
recipesJson.author: enzonik
recipesJson.description: A nice refreshing profile. Pretty straightforward and simple formula. Nice floral green tea with a splash of cream and a touch of lemon. Super chilled with the ws-23 without the menthol like taste of ice flavors. This is an awesome recipe thatâ€™s perfect for a warm day!
